title: 5 Easy Steps to Turn on Footsteps Notification in Fortnite

steps.title: Launch Fortnite
steps.content: Launch Fortnite . Fortnite is available on PC/Mac, mobile, PlayStation, Xbox consoles , and Nintendo Switch. You can use Fortnite's accessibility feature to see "footsteps" and other actions around you.

steps.title: Open the Settings menu.
steps.content: Open the Settings menu. Select the three-lines icon in the top-left corner of the screen, and then select the cog icon in the bottom-left corner of the panel. In the Menu , select Settings . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select the Audio tab.
steps.content: Select the Audio tab. This looks like a speaker icon. You can find this at the top, between the controller icon and arrow keys icon. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle on "Visualize Sound Effects."
steps.content: Toggle on "Visualize Sound Effects." This will be underneath the Sound header, below Subtitles . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select Apply.
steps.content: Select Apply . This will apply your changes. You can now queue up for a game solo or with friends . [4] X Research source This feature can help you improve at Fortnite , especially when you're in a region that is difficult to navigate.
